name: garchompite
effect: Held: Allows Garchomp to Mega Evolve into Mega Garchomp.
short_effect: Held: Allows Garchomp to Mega Evolve into Mega Garchomp.

flavor_text.sword-shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Garchomp hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
